Articles.Content:
Hello, everyone. I\'m new to the forums and fairly new to the game. My brother got me the game just a short while before the .15 update and told me to consider it a late birthday present. I\'ve been hooked ever since. I\'ve made several landings on both moons despite the complete inability to build a rocket that flies even remotely stable during initial liftoff. ;P

At any rate, I\'m looking forward to seeing what comes next for KSP. I\'ve heard rumors of things like orbital rendezvous... I\'ll need lots more practice flying before I can handle that. lol ;D

See you all around the forum,

-Menecroth (a.k.a. Nat Kerman)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
